summary: This document is an email exchange regarding the balance of a personal account associated with Jeffrey Epstein. Amanda Kirby informs Richard Kahn that the account has a $0 balance and that no wires have been received from JPM Best. The correspondence highlights the financial status of Epstein's accounts.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas and is responding to an inquiry about the balance of a personal account associated with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is inquiring about the balance of Jeffrey Epstein's personal account to ensure proper funding for wire transfers.

persons.name: Harry Beller
persons.context: Harry Beller is copied on the email correspondence regarding the account balance inquiry.

persons.name: Bella Klein
persons.context: Bella Klein is also copied on the email correspondence regarding the account balance inquiry.

Richard Kahn includes Harry Beller in the correspondence, suggesting a professional connection regarding the account inquiry.
Richard Kahn includes Bella Klein in the correspondence, indicating a professional connection related to the account inquiry.
